channel.title: Comments on: Weekly Schedule
channel.description: WordPress Plugins, Plugin Development Cookbook and random thoughts

item.title: By: ylefebvre
item.dc:creator: ylefebvre
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-17107">Gykfen Kasemi</a>.
Hi Gykfen, you can just take a look at the page's sourcecode to see the stylesheet data that the person entered on their web site. Just look for WeeklyScheduleStyle in the page source code.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gykfen Kasemi.

Hi Gykfen, you can just take a look at the page’s sourcecode to see the stylesheet data that the person entered on their web site. Just look for WeeklyScheduleStyle in the page source code.

item.title: By: ylefebvre
item.dc:creator: ylefebvre
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-17069">Hubert</a>.
Hi Hubert. No, this is not possible with the weekly schedule plugin. You would have to create two entries, an hour long entry on the first day and a 5-hour long entry on the other day.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Hubert.

Hi Hubert. No, this is not possible with the weekly schedule plugin. You would have to create two entries, an hour long entry on the first day and a 5-hour long entry on the other day.

item.title: By: Gykfen Kasemi
item.dc:creator: Gykfen Kasemi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-11312">Marko Strbac</a>.
Hi marko,
Can you please tell me how you did to have days on topheader , I like very much your sylesheet (http://studioforte.vendi.si/urnik/) , can you please help to have the same style schedule
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Marko Strbac.

Hi marko,

Can you please tell me how you did to have days on topheader , I like very much your sylesheet (http://studioforte.vendi.si/urnik/) , can you please help to have the same style schedule

Thanks

item.title: By: Hubert
item.dc:creator: Hubert
item.description: Hi, is there any chance to put schedule between 23:00 - 05:00 am? I understand that 24:00 is of course a new day, but maybe there is a way to "fix it"?
item.content:encoded: Hi, is there any chance to put schedule between 23:00 – 05:00 am? I understand that 24:00 is of course a new day, but maybe there is a way to “fix it”?

item.title: By: ylefebvre
item.dc:creator: ylefebvre
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-13060">Taylor V. Smith</a>.
Hi Taylor, Sorry about that. I had just never re-worked the styling on that page after moving my site to a Multisite WordPress install. Everything looks ok now.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Taylor V. Smith.

Hi Taylor, Sorry about that. I had just never re-worked the styling on that page after moving my site to a Multisite WordPress install. Everything looks ok now.

item.title: By: Taylor V. Smith
item.dc:creator: Taylor V. Smith
item.description: Greetings! I visited your TV Schedule (/2009-2010-tv-schedule/), because I love the example image in the plugin "Screenshot" tab. However, it appears that the stylesheet has changed or is no longer working. Did a WordPress update change something?
item.content:encoded: Greetings! I visited your TV Schedule (/2009-2010-tv-schedule/), because I love the example image in the plugin “Screenshot” tab. However, it appears that the stylesheet has changed or is no longer working. Did a WordPress update change something?

item.title: By: Marko Strbac
item.dc:creator: Marko Strbac
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-11778">ylefebvre</a>.
I did that and now is OK :) Tnx
item.content:encoded:
In reply to ylefebvre.

item.title: By: ylefebvre
item.dc:creator: ylefebvre
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/wordpress-plugins/weekly-schedule/comment-page-5/#comment-11312">Marko Strbac</a>.
Can you check that you have content under the stylesheet editor under the Weekly Schedule menu in the admin. If it's empty, press the reset button. It looks like all of the Weekly Schedule styling is missing from the site.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Marko Strbac.

Can you check that you have content under the stylesheet editor under the Weekly Schedule menu in the admin. If it’s empty, press the reset button. It looks like all of the Weekly Schedule styling is missing from the site.

item.title: By: Marko Strbac
item.dc:creator: Marko Strbac
item.content:encoded:
Hi Yannick,
Love your plugin, but I canÂ´t manage to make vertical alignment to work.
I added:
.ws-schedule table.verticalheader {
float: left;
width: 100px;
}

But it doesnÂ´t fix my issue here:
http://studioforte.vendi.si/urnik/

thanks!
